events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience with software development.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully; the recruiter is impressed with your background in software and devops.
You responded positively and expressed enthusiasm about participating in the technical interview for the engineering role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 2 PM UTC to assess your development skills thoroughly.
You successfully completed the technical interview with flying colors, demonstrating strong expertise in software engineering principles.
The HR interview has been scheduled for the following Monday and will cover culture fit, compensation, and other company policies.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciated your openness and alignment with the teamâ€™s values and expectations.
An official job offer for the Software Engineer role has been sent to you including details about salary, benefits, and start date.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed your excitement to join the engineering team and contribute your skills.
You accepted the job offer officially, confirming your start date and readiness to begin the onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setting up access to the development environment and meeting your new engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering team and first projects underway.
